main event: A witness aboard USS VTB-543 observed a luminous object in the sky moving erratically near the Florida Keys on the night of 29 July 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as spherical and luminous with white and yellow colors,It was approximately 30 to 35 miles away and about 3 to 4 feet in diameter,The object displayed rapid acceleration and could pause in flight,The sighting lasted for around 5 to 7 minutes, with similar sightings reported in the area that evening.
witness description: MSGT. JOHN C. HILL, USN, who observed the object while on watch aboard USS VTB-543
